title: The Story of Okra John = L'Histoire d'Okra John
creator_credit: Magnus Einarsson, Pierre Stevens, Roland Pirker and ONF | NFB
brief_description: Professional storyteller Joan Bodger entertains an audience with a traditional Black folk tale about the tribulations of a slave named Okra John, and how he came to Canada via the “underground railroad.”
